be found at -> random : 1
found at random -> house : 1
at random house -> ian : 1
random house ian -> mcewan : 1
house ian mcewan -> reproduced : 1
ian mcewan reproduced -> with : 1
mcewan reproduced with -> kind : 1
reproduced with kind -> permission : 1
with kind permission -> of : 1
kind permission of -> rootstein : 1
permission of rootstein -> display : 1
of rootstein display -> suzanne : 1
rootstein display suzanne -> lily : 1
display suzanne lily -> photograph : 1
suzanne lily photograph -> mcewan : 1
lily photograph mcewan -> has : 1
photograph mcewan has -> asserted : 1
mcewan has asserted -> his : 1
has asserted his -> right : 1
asserted his right -> to : 1
his right to -> be : 1
to be identified -> as : 1
be identified as -> the : 1
identified as the -> author : 1
as the author -> of : 1
the author of -> this : 1
author of this -> work : 1
of this work -> in : 1
this work in -> accordance : 1
work in accordance -> with : 1
in accordance with -> the : 1
accordance with the -> designs : 1
with the designs -> and : 1
the designs and -> patents : 1
designs and patents -> act : 1
and patents act -> quotation : 1
patents act quotation -> on : 1
act quotation on -> is : 1
quotation on is -> from : 1
on is from -> the : 1
is from the -> song : 1
from the song -> written : 1
the song written -> by : 1
song written by -> jimmy : 1
written by jimmy -> published : 1
by jimmy published -> in : 1
jimmy published in -> the : 1
in the united -> kingdom : 1
the united kingdom -> by : 1
united kingdom by -> jonathan : 1
kingdom by jonathan -> cape : 1
by jonathan cape -> in : 1
jonathan cape in -> cip : 1
cape in cip -> catalogue : 1
in cip catalogue -> record : 1
cip catalogue record -> for : 1
catalogue record for -> this : 1
record for this -> book : 1
for this book -> is : 1
this book is -> available : 1
book is available -> from : 1
is available from -> the : 1
available from the -> british : 1
